abstract: A U.S. real estate fund has sued HSBC Holdings alleging the British bank’s U.S. mortgage trading operation took advantage of the credit crisis to profit at the expense of the fund, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: A U.S. real estate fund has sued HSBC Holdings alleging the British bank’s U.S. mortgage trading operation took advantage of the credit crisis to profit at the expense of the fund, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Real Estate Fund Sues HSBC Over Bond Deal
